title: Resdex Module(Resume Search)
description: Recruiter search and profile bookmarking system for Naukri.com. Handles complex search queries with advanced filtering, pagination, and real-time updates.
architecture: Microservices architecture with Spring Boot, MySQL for primary data, Redis for caching search results, and Elasticsearch for advanced search capabilities. Implemented clean architecture with separation of concerns.

title: Payment Service
description: Config-based multi-gateway payment system supporting multiple payment providers. Handles high transaction volumes with fault tolerance and retry mechanisms.
architecture: Spring Boot microservice with gateway abstraction layer. Supports Razorpay, Stripe, and custom gateways. Uses Redis for transaction state management and MySQL for transaction history. Implements circuit breaker pattern for resilience.

title: Subscription Service
description: Recruiter subscription plans and access control system. Manages plan upgrades, downgrades, feature access, and billing cycles with automated renewals.
architecture: Event-driven microservice using Spring Boot and Spring Cloud. MongoDB for flexible subscription data, Redis for caching active subscriptions, and Kafka for event streaming. Implements saga pattern for distributed transactions.

title: Licensing Server
description: Time-based license expiry and tamper protection system. Generates secure licenses, validates expiry, and prevents unauthorized modifications.
architecture: Spring Boot service with cryptographic license generation using JWT tokens. MySQL for license storage, Redis for active license caching. Implements HMAC-based tamper detection and secure key management.
